name: PK
description: '''PK''' (born on 3 July 1989 as '''Joosep Vau''') is an Estonian musician and the founder of the "Parema Elu Nimel" movement, which advocates the [[Human rights|right]] to [[Spirituality|spiritual]] freedom without [[prejudice]] regardless of [[personal status]] or interests. In addition to a 20-year career as a [[Rapping|rapper]]  and a singer, he is also a DJ and the founder of the [[rave]] series "Serious Frog Business".
